entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is Uncle Vernon's son. He was hit by his father for holding them up while packing his belongings.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is the father of Dudley and Harry. He drove them away from their home without telling them where they were going.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is Uncle Vernon's wife and Dudley and Harry's aunt. She didn't dare ask where they were going.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is Uncle Vernon's son. He shared a room with Dudley at the hotel.

relationships.description: Uncle Vernon hit Dudley for holding them up while packing his belongings.
Uncle Vernon stayed at the hotel with his sons.
